articles.author: Aijaz Hussain, Rajesh Roy, Munir Ahmed
articles.title: Indian military says Pakistani troops fired at positions along the border in disputed Kashmir - AP News
articles.description: India’s military says Pakistani soldiers shot at Indian posts along the highly militarized frontier in disputed Kashmir for a second consecutive night. The cross-border fire followed a gun attack on tourists in Kashmir that India blames Pakistan for. It was t…
articles.content: SRINAGAR, India (AP) Pakistani soldiers fired at Indian posts along the highly militarized frontier in disputed Kashmir for a second consecutive night, the Indian military said Saturday, as tensions … [+5134 chars]
